title: Neurodiversity-Inclusive Management Education: Mobile Learning Based on the Gradual Release of Responsibility Model

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Conducted in smartphone-based, technology-limited settings, considering neurodiverse learner characteristics (attention variability, diverse information processing speeds).

learning_goals: Learners achieve a proficiency of over 80% in analyzing business cases step-by-step according to the GRR model.
Complete interactive simulation tasks at least three times weekly in a mobile environment.
At the end of learning, apply the 4-step feedback model (Observe-Question-Suggest-Implement) in collaboration with neurodiverse peers.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
